law.text: The authority may promulgate administrative regulations to implement KRS 224A.111, 224A.1115, and 224A.112.
law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 529, sec. 20, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 69, sec. 76, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 373, sec. 9, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 124, sec. 15, effective March 31, 1988.
